_header: An angel that was fair and bright
Note: For a variant of this song see 473.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Annunciation to; carols, Annunciation
_description: James Ryman (?), A carol of the Annunciation — nine quatrains (aaab) and two-line burden (bb): ‘Heyle mary meyden meke and mylde / Thou shalte conceyue and bere a chylde’

CULEe112.First Lines:
An angelle thatte was fayre and bryghtCame to Mary with fulle grete
                    lyght…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And by the grace of god almyghtShe conceyuyd and bore a
                    chylde
CULEe112.Attributed Author: Not attributed to Ryman in MS.
